segments.text: I walk into this kitchen view and freeze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water over the edge unexpectedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying her plate hasn't a clue about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing fast at her feet— how did that start?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the boy on the stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, and he's grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts— is it going to fall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, hand out, joining the surprise raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this happening behind the mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window looks so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, kids in peril— what a shock.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
